name: Amr Mohammed
summary: Aspiring ML Engineer with a solid foundation in data structures, object-oriented programming, and Git. Eager to apply knowledge of Python, TensorFlow, and Scikit-learn to develop intelligent solutions and contribute to real-world machine learning projects.

projects.name: AI-Powered Resume Builder
projects.description:
Developing a full-stack web app to transform resumes and online profiles into ATS-compliant CVs using the Gemini LLM API and NLP.
Building a real-time content editor with PDF export, leveraging Flask, PyMuPDF, and a modular architecture.

projects.name: Local Product Finder (GP)
projects.description: Built a hybrid recommendation system combining content-based filtering (Sentence-BERT) and collaborative filtering (LightFM) to suggest local alternatives.

projects.name: AlphaLearn Game
projects.description:
Developed a Unity game where difficulty adapts to player performance using reinforcement learning.
Integrated an ONNX model that adjusts speed and obstacles in real-time based on player score.

certificates.name: Mathematics for Machine Learning
certificates.description: Completed the Mathematics for Machine Learning certification. Learned the fundamental mathematical concepts behind machine learning algorithms.

certificates.name: CS50’s Introduction to Artificial Intelligence with Python
certificates.description: Completed Harvard's CS50's Introduction to Artificial Intelligence with Python course. Gained proficiency in AI concepts and Python programming.
